interpretation: The Flag of Nauru represents the small island nation in the Pacific Ocean. It features a blue background and a white star symbolizing the country's independence and unity. This card signifies the importance of standing on one's own feet and taking control of one's life. It encourages you to embrace your uniqueness and celebrate your individuality. The Nauru flag is also a reminder that you should not be afraid to ask for help when needed, as it is a symbol of the country's struggle to achieve self-sufficiency. This card may also represent your connection to the ocean and the vastness of nature. It reminds you to seek peace and tranquility in your life. Overall, this card is a symbol of independence, unity, and self-empowerment.
